item.title: Graphite Reporter
item.description: Reaper can be configured to periodically report metrics to a Graphite host. This can be done using the following properties in the Reaper configuration YAML file. Metrics: frequency: 1 minute reporters: - type: graphite host: <host_address> port: <port_number> prefix: <prefix> Where: host_address is hostname of the Graphite server to report to. port_number is port of the Graphite server to report to. prefix is prefix for Metric key names that are reported to the Graphite server.
